Title: The Day Before
Plot: The lives of Jake and Hawkins are explored during this flashback episode. This episode begins 36 hours before the bombs went off. Sarah is introduced and is associated to Hawkins. Jake had been living in San Diego.
GuestStars: Erica Munoz,  Andrew Borba,  Rob Swanson,  Milby Barron,  James Parks,  Maurice Godin,  Mark Adair-Rios,  Darby Stanchfield,  April D Parker
